com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILPLocalNotification

    public interface ILPMessage
    A message is a communication (generally marketing-related) sent from the server.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.4.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBody()
      Returns the body of this message.
      Date getExpirationDate()
      Returns the expiration date of this message.
      ILPID getID()
      Returns the internal unique identifier of the campaign with which this message is associated.
      Map<String,String> getMetadata()
      Returns the metadata of this message.
      String getMetadataValue(String key)
      Returns the message metadata value for a key.
      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this message.
      boolean isRead()
      Indicates whether this message has been read.

    • Method Detail

      • getBody

        String getBody()
        Returns the body of this message.

        The value returned by this method is usually HTML. This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the body of this message

      • getExpirationDate

        Date getExpirationDate()
        Returns the expiration date of this message.

        An application may wish to display messages differently based on their expiration dates. This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the expiration date of this message

      • getID

        ILPID getID()
        Returns the internal unique identifier of the campaign with which this message is associated.

        There can be at most one message associated with a campaign at any given time. This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the internal unique identifier of the campaign with which this message is associated

      • getTitle

        String getTitle()
        Returns the title of this message.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the title of this message

      • isRead

        boolean isRead()
        Indicates whether this message has been read.

        A message is considered read if getBody() has been called on it.

        Returns:
        true if this message has been read; false otherwise

      • getMetadata

        Map<String,String> getMetadata()
        Returns the metadata of this message.

        This method should never return null, will it return an empty Map if there is no metadata associated with the message.

        Returns:
        the metadata of this message

      • getMetadataValue

        String getMetadataValue(String key)
        Returns the message metadata value for a key.

        This method returns null if the metadata does not contain an entry with the key.

        Parameters:
        key - The key of the metadata entry
        Returns:
        the value of the metadata entry
